basic.color: Leaf coverd with white tomentum, flower color orange red

maintenance.soil: Peat and akadama mixed in 3:1 ratio
maintenance.sunlight: Like sunglight in winter and put in places with bright scattered light in summer
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly when soil surface is dry
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply once monthly in spring and autumn
maintenance.pruning: Remove old, diseased and dead leaves timely
